name: Peterson, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Company

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ohidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
parties: Peterson, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judges Ceumlish and Sloane.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: John J. McDevitt, 3rd, with him Jay B. Leopold, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Peterson, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Transportation Company.
Argued November 18, 1952.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ohidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
Michael A. Foley, for appellant.
John J. McDevitt, 3rd, with him Jay B. Leopold, for appellee.
November 25, 1952:
